testcase.name: Change Self Password
testcase.summary: Verify if System allows User to change Self Password.

step.expectedresults: System shows the Change Password Form.
System shows the "Current Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills new Password with a value different of actual.
step.expectedresults: System shows the "New Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills "Confirm Password" field with same value of "New Password".
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Confirm Password" field filled and encrypted.
System shows the confirmation of Password change.

step.actions: User logout and logs with same User with new Password.
step.expectedresults: System shows the System logged in.
System goes to the login page.

step.actions: User logs in to with changed password.
step.expectedresults: System shows home page.

testcase.name: Change Self Password without Current Password
testcase.summary: Verify if System does not allow User to change Self Password without insert Current Password.

step.expectedresults: System shows the Change Password Form.
System shows the "Current Password" field empty.

step.actions: User fills new Password with a value different of actual.
step.expectedresults: System shows the "New Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills "Confirm Password" field with same value of "New Password".
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Confirm Password" field filled and encrypted.
System does not change Password and shows a message informing "Current Password" is required.

testcase.name: Change Self Password without New Password
testcase.summary: Verify if System does not allow User to change Self Password without insert New Password.

step.expectedresults: System shows the Change Password Form.
System shows the "Current Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User does not fill new Password .
step.expectedresults: System shows the "New Password" field empty.

step.actions: User fills "Confirm Password" field with same value of "New Password".
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Confirm Password" field filled and encrypted.
System does not change Password and shows a message informing "New Password" is required.

testcase.name: Change Self Password without Confirm Password
testcase.summary: Verify if System does not allow User to change Self Password without insert Confirm Password.

step.expectedresults: System shows the Change Password Form.
System shows the "Current Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills new Password with a value different of actual.
step.expectedresults: System shows the "New Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User does not fill "Confirm Password" field.
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Confirm Password" field empty.
System does not change Password and shows a message informing "Confirm Password" is required.

testcase.name: Change Self Password with unmatching Confirm Password
testcase.summary: Verify if System does not allow User to change Self Password with unmatching Confirm Password.

step.expectedresults: System shows the Change Password Form.
System shows the "Current Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills new Password with a value different of actual.
step.expectedresults: System shows the "New Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills "Confirm Password" field with a value different of new Password.
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Confirm Password" field filled and encrypted.
System does not change Password and shows a message informing "Confirm Password" is unmatching with "New Password".

testcase.name: Change Self Password with wrong Current Password
testcase.summary: Verify if System does not allow User to change Self Password insertin wrong Current Password.

step.expectedresults: System shows the Change Password Form.
System shows the "Current Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills new Password with a value different of actual.
step.expectedresults: System shows the "New Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills "Confirm Password" field with same value of "New Password".
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Confirm Password" field filled and encrypted.
System does not change Password and shows a message informing "Current Password" is wrong.

testcase.name: Change Self Password with New Password equals to current Password
testcase.summary: Verify if System does not allow User to change Self Password with New Password equals to Current.

step.expectedresults: System shows the Change Password Form.
System shows the "Current Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills new Password equals to Current.
step.expectedresults: System shows the "New Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills "Confirm Password" field with same value of "New Password".
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Confirm Password" field filled and encrypted.
System does not change Password and shows a message informing "New Password" must be different of Current.

testcase.name: Change Self Password and logs with acient
testcase.summary: Verify if System does not allow User to change Self Password and logs with acient.

step.expectedresults: System shows the Change Password Form.
System shows the "Current Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills new Password with a value different of actual.
step.expectedresults: System shows the "New Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills "Confirm Password" field with same value of "New Password".
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Confirm Password" field filled and encrypted.
System shows the confirmation of Password change.

step.actions: User logout and logs with same User with acient Password.
step.expectedresults: System shows the invalid credentials.

testcase.name: Change Self Password with New Password without letters
testcase.summary: Verify if System does not allow User to change Self Password with New Password without letters.

step.expectedresults: System shows the Change Password Form.
System shows the "Current Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills new Password with lenght at least 6, without letters.
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Password must have at least 6 mixed letters and numbers".

step.actions: User fills "Confirm Password" field with same value of "New Password".
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Password must have at least 6 mixed letters and numbers".
System does not enables button, and  the messages errors must be shown

testcase.name: Change Self Password with New Password without numbers
testcase.summary: Verify if System does not allow User to change Self Password with New Password without numbers.

step.expectedresults: System shows the Change Password Form.
System shows the "Current Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills new Password with lenght at least 6, without numbers.
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Password must have at least 6 mixed letters and numbers".

step.actions: User fills "Confirm Password" field with same value of "New Password".
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Password must have at least 6 mixed letters and numbers".
System does not enables button, and  the messages errors must be shown

testcase.name: Change Self Password with New Password with lenght lesser than minimum
testcase.summary: Verify if System does not allow User to change Self Password with New Password with lenght less than minimum.

step.expectedresults: System shows the Change Password Form.
System shows the "Current Password" field filled and encrypted.

step.actions: User fills new Password with letters and numbers but with lenght lesser than minimum (6).
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Password must have at least 6 mixed letters and numbers".

step.actions: User fills "Confirm Password" field with same value of "New Password".
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Password must have at least 6 mixed letters and numbers".
System does not enables button, and  the messages errors must be shown

testcase.name: Change Self Password with all empty fields
testcase.summary: This test case verify if system does not allow the user to change the password with all the empty fields
testcase.preconditions: - User must be logged in the system

step.expectedresults: System shows the Change Password Form;

step.actions: User does not fills "Current Password", "New Password" and "Confirm Password";
step.expectedresults: System shows the "Current Password", "New Password" and "Confirm Password" with fields empty
System shows the message "This field is required" below of all fields

testcase.name: Change Self password with fields Current Password and Confirm Password empty
testcase.summary: Verify if the system shows message the empty fields and that does not permit change password

step.expectedresults: System shows Change Password Form;

step.actions: User does not fills "Current Password" field;
step.expectedresults: System shows the Current Password field empty;
System shows the "New Password" field filled and encrypted;

step.actions: User does not fills "Confirm Password" field;
step.expectedresults: System shows the Confirm Password field empty;
System shows the message "The field is required" below in the two empty fields;

testcase.name: Change Self Password with fields Current Password and New Password empty
testcase.summary: Verify if the system shows message the empty fields and that does not permit change password

step.expectedresults: System shows Change Password Form;

step.actions: User does not fills "Current Password" field;
step.expectedresults: System shows the Current Password field empty;

step.actions: User does not fills "New Password" field;
step.expectedresults: System shows the New Password field empty;
System shows the "Confirm Password" field filled and encrypted;
System shows the message "The field is required" below in the two empty fields;
